Detailed Description

a four-dimensional torus where a sphere circles about a center point in a direction perpendicular to all directions making up the sphere

Torus2 c'tor given a definition set in R³ (as parameter space) and two radii - a major and a minor (defining a sphere)

Parameters:

_tmax maximal value in t

_umax maximal value in u
_du stepsize in u

_vmax maximal value in v

_r minor radius
